thread.section_title: WowVendor.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WowVendor.com | wowvendor.com
thread.title: Unhappy

author: Unhappy
title: Unhappy
text: Purchased a normal NH raid clear with personal loot. The raid started a bit late but no big deal, once we started we killed all the bosses with ease it only took about an hour and a half for a whole clear which is awesome. I was lucky enough to get a legendary and 2 bits of gear. But my stupid bonus rolls let me down! Lol. All in all I'd recommend these guys if your looking for a quick and easy boost.
